languages.text: "Все правильно. Силу надо брать из любого источника".
"Quite right. One must not turn down power, whatever the source."
languages.original_text: "Все правильно. Силу надо брать из любого источника".

traits.locale_text: "That is right. One must not turn down power, whatever the source."
"That is right. One must not turn down power, whatever the source."
"it's spot on. One must not turn down power, whatever the source."
"it's spot on. One must not turn down power, whatever the source."
"Quite right. One must not turn down power, whatever the source."
"Quite right. One must not turn down power, whatever the source."

languages.text: 「そうだ。源が何だとしても、パワーを断ってはならない」
languages.original_text: "Quite right. One must not turn down power, whatever the source."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ。源が何だとしても、パワーを断ってはならない」

languages.text: “说得没错。人不该拒绝力量，无论是什么力量。”
languages.original_text: "Quite right. One must not turn down power, whatever the source."

traits.locale_text: “你做得没错。人不应该拒绝力量，无论是什么力量。”

languages.text: «Así es. Nunca se debe rechazar el poder, sin importar la forma que adopte».
languages.original_text: "Quite right. One must not turn down power, whatever the source."

traits.locale_text: «Comprensible. Nunca se debe rechazar el poder, sin importar la forma que adopte».

languages.text: "Wohl wahr. Man darf Macht nicht ablehnen, woher sie auch stammt."
languages.original_text: "Quite right. One must not turn down power, whatever the source."

traits.locale_text: "Genau richtig. Man darf Macht nicht ablehnen, woher sie auch stammt."

languages.text: « Vous avez raison. Il ne faut jamais refuser de gagner en puissance, quelle qu'en soit la source. »
languages.original_text: "Quite right. One must not turn down power, whatever the source."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez eu parfaitement raison. Il ne faut jamais refuser de gagner en puissance, quelle qu'en soit la source. »

languages.text: "Çok haklısın. Kaynağı ne olursa olsun gücü asla reddetmemek gerek."
languages.original_text: "Quite right. One must not turn down power, whatever the source."

traits.locale_text: "Gayet haklısın. Kaynağı ne olursa olsun gücü asla reddetmemek gerek."
